completeListOfAbilities.name: Army of One
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Melee  PG attack +  PF attackã€? followed twice by 2-hit  PG attack +  PF attack
Increased BRV damage when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Moderate HP recovery based on cumulative HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP; HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV
Delays target 1 turn
Self: 3 turns Knight of Etro
Next turn after use does not consume ability use count
Becomes Army of One+ while Ravager active
Inflicting Break while Knight of Etro active grants additional turn; inflicting Break during additional turn does not grant another
Additional turn does not add to turn count; does consume count during summoningã€? support

ailments.name: Knight of Etro
ailments.desc: Knight of Etro: Raises MAX BRVã€? ATK; grants PK Enchant

ailments.name: Siphon
ailments.desc: Siphon: Does not consume use count

completeListOfAbilities.name: Sparkstrike
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit  PK melee  PG attack +  PF attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 110%
Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt
Self: 6 turns 1 level of Ravager (limit 2)
Cancels Commando
Higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
Flourish of Steel becomes Flourish of Steel+ with 2 levels of Ravager
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ravager)ã€? HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ravager) while Ravager active

ailments.name: Ravager
ailments.desc: Ravager: Raises MAX BRVã€? SPD (does not increase based on level)

Self: 3 turns Ravager

ailments.name: Ravager
ailments.desc: Ravager: Raises MAX BRV and SPD

passives.name: Sparkstrike Extension
passives.desc:
Sparkstrike use +2

When using Sparkstrikeã€? Sparkstrike+:
 â€¢ Ravager becomes level based; grants 1 level of Ravager (limit 2)
 â€¢ Slight Ravager MAX BRV Up boost (does not increase based on level)
 â€¢ Granted buff duration +3
 â€¢ Triggers additional  PF attack after use

When using Sparkstrike:
 â€¢ Tremendous BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 110%
 â€¢ Increases BRV by 10% of HP damage dealt

While 2 levels of Ravager active:
 â€¢ Flourish of Steel becomes Flourish of Steel+ (tremendous BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%)

While Ravager active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Ravager) ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Ravager level by 1)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Ravager) (increases BRV based on ATK; melee  PG attack +  PF attack; increases active Ravager level by 1)

passives.name: Ability Attack Bonus
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt during ability chain\n*Also applies to abilities changed from BRV Attackã€? HP Attack
passives.short_desc: Ability Attack Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Flourish of Steel Extension
passives.desc:
Flourish of Steel use +2

When using Flourish of Steelã€? Flourish of Steel+:
 â€¢ Commando becomes level based; grants 1 level of Commando (limit 2)
 â€¢ Slight Commando MAX BRV Upã€? ATK Up boost (does not increase based on level)
 â€¢ Granted buff duration +3

When using Flourish of Steel:
 â€¢ Tremendous BRV damage boost
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

While 2 levels of Commando active:
 â€¢ Sparkstrike becomes Sparkstrike+ (tremendous BRV damage boost; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt)

While Commando active:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Commando) ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; increases active Commando level by 1)
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Commando) (increases BRV based on ATK; melee  PG attack +  PF attack; increases active Commando level by 1)
passives.short_desc: Flourish of Steel Extension: Boost to Flourish of Steel

 â€¢ Raises turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target afflicted with Break
